text: Stefano Travaglia was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Pablo Andújar won the title after defeating Benoît Paire 4–6, 7–6(8–6), 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Casino Admiral Trophy - Singles
title: 2019 Casino Admiral Trophy – Singles
